sentence: Maintenance came up to the room to assist in opening the door
The hotel needs some updating but it is near the highway and a cool spot to layou low in especially if you are able to catch room at good price compared to other hotels near and downtown
if you have an option do not stay there until their renewal they said next year in 2016
He checked my account and said my profile had been set up incorrectly but he would update it to reflect the business card for the hotel bill
Hotel under renovation and no pool service
Was excited to experience the indoor pool but sadly they were doing renovations on it during our stay

Room was clean to start but did not appear to get vacuumed or thoroughly cleaned throughout the week thermostat was broken they did send someone to repair it but it still did not function correctly after that the premade eggs at breakfast looked like they had been sitting there for a week but there are made to order eggs available as well
Should be wonderful when the renovations are finish
The hotel is under renovation which appears as uncontrolled filth and I wonder if the walkways in the lobby and leading to the elevators would pass an OSHA inspection
The lobby is in shambles during renovations the customer service should be above and beyond because of this but it is subpar
most impressive the new remodeling that has been done to hotel where it makes you feel home
it is newly renovated and it looks amazing
it is newly renovated and looks wonderful I have stayed here numerous times since September for work and I have really enjoyed the time I spent here
Great Breakfast clean rooms soft mattress and pilowsThe hotel is under maintenance
new renovation was beautiful the breakfast was great
